def finding_motif(src, mask):
    result = []
    mlen = len(mask)
    slen = len(src)
    for i in range(0, slen - mlen + 1):
        if src[i:i+mlen] == mask:
            result.append(i+1)        
    return result

print finding_motif('', 'ATGACATAT')
